T02TD2013E:221a-1: shr'i badzra bhee ra wa badzra pra ka ra s'a dha n'a ma /

T02TD2013E:224a-10: las byas shar sgor pad nyi bsgom //
T02TD2013E:224a-11: danda dhrik gis dbyug pa gshed //
T02TD2013E:224a-12: lho yi sgo ru de bzhin gzhag / padma dhrik gis nub sgo ru //
T02TD2013E:224a-13: padma gshed ni bsgom par bya //
T02TD2013E:224a-14: khang+ga dhrik gis ral gri gshed //
T02TD2013E:224a-15: byang gi sgo ru bsgom par bya //
T02TD2013E:224a-16: dkyil 'khor dag la mnyam par blta //
T02TD2013E:224a-18: gshin rje gshed nag 'jigs byed kyis //
T02TD2013E:224a-19: dkyil 'khor lha rnams mig la sogs //
T02TD2013E:224a-26: lha rnams dag tu byin gyis brlab ;
T02TD2013E:224a-28: 'khor lo rdo rje rin chen pad //
T02TD2013E:224a-29: ral gri rdo rje sa snying dang //
T02TD2013E:224a-30: phyag na rdo rje mkha' snying po //
T02TD2013E:224a-31: spyan ras gzigs mgon sgrib pa sel //
T02TD2013E:224a-32: kun du bzang po bsgom par bya //
T02TD2013E:224a-33: phyag na rdo rje kun du bzang //
T02TD2013E:224a-34: thugs kyi rdo rje 'dra bar bsgom /
T02TD2013E:224a-35: mig ni gti mug sna phra ma //
T02TD2013E:224a-36: lce la 'dod chags lus phrag dog / gshed po 'dra bar go cha bya //
T02TD2013E:224a-37: khro bo sgeg pa'i gzugs can no //
T02TD2013E:224a-38: snying gar h'um nag a'a: dmar kha //
T02TD2013E:224a-39: mgo bor aom ni dkar po bsgom //
T02TD2013E:224a-41: sku gsung rdo rje spro bsdu bsgom //
T02TD2013E:224a-42: aom sarba ta th'a ga tatsitta badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD2013E:224a-43: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta w'aka badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD2013E:224a-44: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD2013E:224a-45: rang snying sa bon 'od zer gyis //
T02TD2013E:224a-46: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kun bkug nas //
T02TD2013E:224a-47: mdun du dmigs la mchod pas mchod //
T02TD2013E:224a-48: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi shinytsa m'i brjod pas /
T02TD2013E:224a-49: ts'a rtsi sogs kyis bkra shis glu //
T02TD2013E:224a-50: bdud rtsi bum pas bkrus pa dang //
T02TD2013E:224a-51: gtso bos dbang bskur gtso bo la //
T02TD2013E:224a-52: rdo rje 'chang nyid cod pan te //
T02TD2013E:224a-53: 'khor lo pa la gshin rje gshed //
T02TD2013E:224a-54: cod pan dag dang ldan par bsgom //
T02TD2013E:224b-0: rang snying @224b sa bon 'od zer gyis //
T02TD2013E:224b-1: ye shes 'khor lo spyan drangs la //
T02TD2013E:224b-2: khro bos bgegs bskrad mchod byas la //
T02TD2013E:224b-3: sgo ba bzhi yis gnyis med bsre //
T02TD2013E:224b-4: sangs rgyas thams cad sa bon gyis //
T02TD2013E:224b-5: zhal zhugs zhu pas rdo rje'i lam //
T02TD2013E:224b-6: padmar dbyung dang phyung ba las //
T02TD2013E:224b-7: lha mo sna tshogs med tog sogs ;
T02TD2013E:224b-8: / phyi yi mchod pas mdzes par mchod //
T02TD2013E:224b-9: ts'a rtsi sogs kyis bdud rtsi dang //
T02TD2013E:224b-10: sha lngas tshim par bya ba dang //
T02TD2013E:224b-11: rang rig gnyis pas gnyis med mchod //
T02TD2013E:224b-12: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD2013E:224b-13: brag ca lta bu phul ba de //
T02TD2013E:224b-14: sgra brnyan nyid du rang la thim //
T02TD2013E:224b-15: de bzhin bstod pas legs par bstod //
T02TD2013E:224b-16: gshin rje gshed po rab 'jigs pa //
T02TD2013E:224b-17: gti mug rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod //
T02TD2013E:224b-18: ston pa sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin //
T02TD2013E:224b-19: rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2013E:224b-20: gshin rje gshed po rab 'jigs pa //
T02TD2013E:224b-21: phra ma rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod //
T02TD2013E:224b-22: rdo rje thugs dang rab mtshungs pa //
T02TD2013E:224b-23: rin chen rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2013E:224b-24: 'dod chags rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod //
T02TD2013E:224b-26: dbyangs mchog kun gyi gtso bo'i gtso //
T02TD2013E:224b-27: rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2013E:224b-28: phrag dog rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod //
T02TD2013E:224b-29: gshin rje gshed po las kun byed //
T02TD2013E:224b-30: rdo rje sku dang rab tu mtshungs //
T02TD2013E:224b-31: phyag na rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2013E:224b-32: sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bo khyod //
T02TD2013E:224b-33: sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa //
T02TD2013E:224b-34: sangs rgyas kun mchog gtso bo'i gtso //
T02TD2013E:224b-36: de ltar bstod nas lha rnams spro //
T02TD2013E:224b-37: 'gro ba sbyangs nas 'khor lor gzhug /'khor lo legs bsdus phung po khams //
T02TD2013E:224b-38: skye mched yan lag rang bzhin shes //
T02TD2013E:224b-39: rnal 'byor chen po zhes bya ba //
T02TD2013E:224b-40: rnal 'byor ye shes brtan par bsgom //
T02TD2013E:224b-41: der bsdu ba'am shar sgo lho //
T02TD2013E:224b-42: nub byang lha mo rim pas bsdu //
T02TD2013E:224b-43: zhal dgu rdo rje rtse mo ru //
T02TD2013E:224b-44: 'khor lo bsgom dang rtsa ba dag / lte ba snying ga de bzhin bsgom //
T02TD2013E:224b-45: de nas gnas kyi 'khor lo ni //
T02TD2013E:224b-46: bskyed pa rnal 'byor chen po bya //
T02TD2013E:224b-47: de brtan ya m'anta ka nyid //
T02TD2013E:224b-48: zhal gsum rjes kyi rnal 'byor skur //
T02TD2013E:224b-49: sgom pa rdo rje rtse dang rtsa //
T02TD2013E:225a-2: de rjes 'jam dpal ye shes nyid //
T02TD2013E:225a-3: dang po sangs rgyas gyur pa ni //
T02TD2013E:225a-4: rdo rje rtse mo rtsa bar bsgom //
T02TD2013E:225a-5: lte ba snying ga de bzhin bsgom //
T02TD2013E:225a-6: de nas gnas kyi rim pa las //
T02TD2013E:225a-7: ram bam lam yam rim par dgod //
T02TD2013E:225a-8: lus glod ngag bsdams yid bcings la /
T02TD2013E:225a-9: 'bar la bsros pas dbab par bya //
T02TD2013E:225a-10: babs pas zhi dang snying gar gnas //
T02TD2013E:225a-11: dbang bzhi'i rim pas thig le drangs //
T02TD2013E:225a-12: bde ba mi rtog stong nyid la //
T02TD2013E:225a-14: de yang dmigs nas spro dang bsdu //
T02TD2013E:225a-15: gsal dang brtan pa spro bya zhing //
T02TD2013E:225a-16: 'dus pa de la rgyun du gzhag / sems med sems kyi 'od gsal mthong //
T02TD2013E:225a-17: mthong ba'i rtog pa yongs min te //
T02TD2013E:225a-18: kun rdzob nyams la rigs pas smras //
T02TD2013E:225a-19: rjes la phyi dang nang gi chos //
T02TD2013E:225a-20: yang dag dpyad pas grub pa med //
T02TD2013E:225a-21: phyi rol rdul las grub pa ste //
T02TD2013E:225a-22: drug cu drug tu go gcig phyir //
T02TD2013E:225a-23: dpyad pas phra rab grub pa med //
T02TD2013E:225a-24: phyi rol sgyu ma dgag mi bya //
T02TD2013E:225a-25: nang la bdag dang gzhan gnyis kyang //
T02TD2013E:225a-26: grub dang ma grub dpyad pa yis //
T02TD2013E:225a-27: bdag med gzhan yang rtags pa dang //
T02TD2013E:225a-28: mi rtag pa yis bden pa dang //
T02TD2013E:225a-29: gnyis dang gnyis med de las gzhan ;
T02TD2013E:225a-30: / rigs pas rab tu mi gnas so //
T02TD2013E:225a-31: de bas chos rnams rnam par dag / chos sku gzugs sku tha dad med //
T02TD2013E:225a-32: bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa gnyis //
T02TD2013E:225a-33: 'jug dang ldang ba'i rigs shes bya //
T02TD2013E:225a-34: de ltar rtog pas rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD2013E:225a-35: du ba mar me zla nyi yi //
T02TD2013E:225a-36: rtags rnams rim pas nges par 'byung //
T02TD2013E:225a-37: de yis rdo rje'i sku 'grub bo //
T02TD2013E:225a-38: skyon pad zla ba nyi ma la //
T02TD2013E:225a-39: dh'i: dang h'um dang nyi ma dang //
T02TD2013E:225a-40: 'khor lo brgyad kyi rtsibs dang steng //
T02TD2013E:225a-41: nyi steng snying po las sngags dang //
T02TD2013E:225a-42: rtsa ba'i snying pos bskor ba la //
T02TD2013E:225a-43: rang gi rgyu ba shes pa yis //
T02TD2013E:225a-44: zhi rgyas dbang drag gang 'dod pa //
T02TD2013E:225a-45: bsam gtan sogs kyis rim pas bzla //
T02TD2013E:225a-46: de nas sngags kyi bsnyen pa ni //
T02TD2013E:225a-47: zhe sdang can dag 'dul ba la //
T02TD2013E:225a-49: snying gar nyi ma h'um bkod de //
T02TD2013E:225a-50: spro bsdu sngags kyi yi ges bskor //
T02TD2013E:225b-0: bdun 'bum snying po aom @225b dang po ;
T02TD2013E:225b-1: / y'a m'anta ka h'um phat bzlas //
T02TD2013E:225b-3: des kyang 'dul bar ma gyur nas //
T02TD2013E:225b-4: de nas zhal dgu 'jigs byed de //
T02TD2013E:225b-5: hr'i: shtri: spro bsdu shes byas la //
T02TD2013E:225b-6: las sngags rgyal po sum 'bum bzlas //
T02TD2013E:225b-7: des kyang khyab par ma gyur pas //
T02TD2013E:225b-8: lha ni bcu bdun gsal ba yis //
T02TD2013E:225b-9: rtsa sngags bcu bdun spro dang bsdu //
T02TD2013E:225b-10: 'bum phrag gcig ni bzlas par bya //
T02TD2013E:225b-11: de nas bsgrub pa bya ba ni //
T02TD2013E:225b-12: dkyil 'khor gsum gyi dang po ni //
T02TD2013E:225b-13: mar tshes gnyis la dur khrod ras //
T02TD2013E:225b-14: khru do kha sbyor ldan pa blang //
T02TD2013E:225b-15: thal chen sa dkar bdud rtsi lnga ;
T02TD2013E:225b-16: / khrag lnga dug lnga bdud rtsi lnga //
T02TD2013E:225b-17: kha ba lnga dang tsha ba lnga //
T02TD2013E:225b-18: ras brgyad legs par sbyar byas nas //
T02TD2013E:225b-19: bya rog sgro dang mi rus la //
T02TD2013E:225b-20: snyu gu byas la bri ba ni //
T02TD2013E:225b-21: gshin rje pho mo 'jigs ldan pa'i //
T02TD2013E:225b-23: gsum du bskor la phyi rim la ;
T02TD2013E:225b-24: / re mig 'khor lo bcu drug bya //
T02TD2013E:225b-25: phyogs mtshams brgyad la lus kyi sngags //
T02TD2013E:225b-26: hr'i: shtri: ming dang spel ba dgod //
T02TD2013E:225b-27: bar ma me ri mig bcu gnyis //
T02TD2013E:225b-28: h'um phat bsgrub byar bcas pa bri //
T02TD2013E:225b-29: bar ma re mig bcu gnyis la //
T02TD2013E:225b-30: r'a dz'a sa do ru na yo //
T02TD2013E:225b-31: ni ra yatstsha ni rnams bri ;
T02TD2013E:225b-32: / nang ma brgyad la phyogs bzhi ru //
T02TD2013E:225b-33: ma me da kshe dbus su ya //
T02TD2013E:225b-34: mtshams kyi kha stong bzhi la yang //
T02TD2013E:225b-35: bsgrub bya dag la sngags rnams dgod //
T02TD2013E:225b-36: mgo bo phyi ru phyogs par bya //
T02TD2013E:225b-37: spyi bo dpung mgo g-yas g-yon dang //
T02TD2013E:225b-38: brla g-yas dag dang g-yon pa lnga //
T02TD2013E:225b-39: mdoms dang rkang mthil snying po dgod //
T02TD2013E:225b-40: mtshog mar aom hr'i: lag g-yas la //
T02TD2013E:225b-41: shtri: wi rkang mthil g-yas pa la //
T02TD2013E:225b-42: kri t'a na na rkang mthil g-yon //
T02TD2013E:225b-43: h'um phat lag mthil g-yon du'o //
T02TD2013E:225b-44: me dang h'um phat ming dang spel //
T02TD2013E:225b-45: bsgrub bya mtshams bzhir bri ba ni //
T02TD2013E:225b-46: phyogs kyi h'um dang phat brgyad dgod //
T02TD2013E:225b-47: dza dang yas kyang bskor bar bya //
T02TD2013E:225b-48: rtsa ba'i snying po so gnyis kyang //
T02TD2013E:225b-49: bcu bdun lus la bskor bas 'grub //
T02TD2013E:225b-50: ya ni snying gar spyi bor kshe //
T02TD2013E:225b-51: lte bar ma dang kha la me //
T02TD2013E:225b-52: da ni lce dang kha la dgod //
T02TD2013E:225b-53: dpung pa g-yas dang g-yon gnyis la //
T02TD2013E:226a-2: ni ra rim pas dgod par bya //
T02TD2013E:226a-3: dz'a ni sa steng dpral bar dgod //
T02TD2013E:226a-4: sa ni chu ste lte bar bri //
T02TD2013E:226a-5: ngo ni me ste mgrin pa nyid //
T02TD2013E:226a-6: ru ni rlung ste brla ste mdoms su //
T02TD2013E:226a-7: lha mo yum ni g-yon par dgod //
T02TD2013E:226a-8: na yo ni ra mig rna sna //
T02TD2013E:226a-9: lce dang bzhi la mkhas pas dgod//
T02TD2013E:226a-10: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bye brag yin //
T02TD2013E:226a-11: de ltar re mig dgu pa yi //
T02TD2013E:226a-12: dkyil 'khor rgyud las lhag med bri //
T02TD2013E:226a-13: chag chag khrag chen dur khrod tshon //
T02TD2013E:226a-14: lha ni bcu gsum dkyil 'khor yang //
T02TD2013E:226a-16: mchod gtor bzang ba sgron ma lnga //
T02TD2013E:226a-17: sa bdun rgyu las gshin rje'i gzugs //
T02TD2013E:226a-18: khru gang shin tu 'jigs par bya //
T02TD2013E:226a-19: 'khor lo dang bcas lho sgor gzhag / rgyud ltar byas la rab gnas ni //
T02TD2013E:226a-20: rlung che'i nang du rlung me dang //
T02TD2013E:226a-21: ya dang ral gri las skyes pa //
T02TD2013E:226a-23: sna tshogs mtshon cha 'khor na gnas /
T02TD2013E:226a-24: lto ba srid gsum phyogs skyong dang //
T02TD2013E:226a-25: gshin rje pho mo las byed rnams //
T02TD2013E:226a-26: rgyu rkyen 'bras bu shes par bsgom //
T02TD2013E:226a-27: sa bdun 'khor lo'i rdzas rnams la //
T02TD2013E:226a-28: de yi bdud rtsi rjes dang bsre //
T02TD2013E:226a-29: gzugs brnyan sor brgyad bya ba dang //
T02TD2013E:226a-30: 'khor lo yi ge sngar ltar dgod //
T02TD2013E:226a-31: lho sgor gshin rje'i mdun du yang //
T02TD2013E:226a-32: thod pa gsum la kha sbyor gzhag / de ltar bri ba'i rnal 'byor ba //
T02TD2013E:226a-33: skra grol gcer bu bdud rtsis byugs //
T02TD2013E:226a-34: lho phyogs ma he zhal ltar sbyar //
T02TD2013E:226a-35: mchod gtor gsol ba gdab pa shis //
T02TD2013E:226a-36: de nas rnal 'byor bzhi rdzogs nas //
T02TD2013E:226a-37: ya m'anta kar bsgyur byas la //
T02TD2013E:226a-38: snying ga'i nyi ma h'um 'od kyis //
T02TD2013E:226a-39: rgyal ba sras bcas khro bo rnams //
T02TD2013E:226a-40: bskul te bsgrub bya'i ye shes dang //
T02TD2013E:226a-41: bsrung ba rang gi snying gar gzhug / rang bzhin dbang dang gzi byin bskyed //
T02TD2013E:226a-42: de yi 'jig rten lha dag kun //
T02TD2013E:226a-43: chos skyong rnams dang bral bar bya //
T02TD2013E:226a-44: zla ba phyed du bdun 'bum bya //
T02TD2013E:226a-45: 'khor lo'i gzugs la gzhug pa ste //
T02TD2013E:226a-46: khugs nas 'khor lo'i las shis so //
T02TD2013E:226a-47: zla ba phyed du rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD2013E:226a-48: re mig dgu pa'i dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD2013E:226a-49: lho nas zhugs shing lho ru blta //
T02TD2013E:226a-50: snying ga'i snying po spros pa yis //
T02TD2013E:226b-0: las kyi gshin @226b rje'i lto bar dkrugs //
T02TD2013E:226b-1: gshin rje bka' bsgo phyogs skyong dang //
T02TD2013E:226b-2: gshin rje'i tshogs rnams mdag pa yis //
T02TD2013E:226b-3: aom dang hr'i: shtri: wi kri sogs //
T02TD2013E:226b-4: steng dang shar lho nub byang gi / phyogs skyong bskul bas khyab 'jug sogs //
T02TD2013E:226b-5: bsgrub bya'i rnam shes reg bya 'dren //
T02TD2013E:226b-6: bsgrub bya'i sems dang reg bya skyong //
T02TD2013E:226b-7: de nas 'pho la rings pa yis //
T02TD2013E:226b-8: gshin rje'i lto bar de nas 'ong //
T02TD2013E:226b-9: brgya byin sprul pa 'khor tshogs kyis //
T02TD2013E:226b-10: gzugs phung mig gi khams bcas dkrugs //
T02TD2013E:226b-11: gshin rjes tshor ba sna tshogs dkrugs //
T02TD2013E:226b-12: klu yis 'du shes sna khams dkrugs //
T02TD2013E:226b-13: gnod sbyin 'du byed lce tshogs rnams //
T02TD2013E:226b-14: dkrugs pas skyo nas lto bar yod //
T02TD2013E:226b-15: steng 'og mtshams bzhi de bzhin du //
T02TD2013E:226b-16: srog gcod sha za khrag 'thung zhing //
T02TD2013E:226b-17: mdangs 'phrog dbugs len par yang byed //
T02TD2013E:226b-18: lus lci la sogs 'byung ba rgud //
T02TD2013E:226b-19: rnam shes 'pho ba'i las byed cing //
T02TD2013E:226b-20: gshin rje'i lto bar 'gugs par byed //
T02TD2013E:226b-21: 'bum phrag gsum gyis dbugs gzhug pa //
T02TD2013E:226b-22: hr'i shri: bcu pa'i las yin no //
T02TD2013E:226b-23: de nas 'khor lo kha sbyar du //
T02TD2013E:226b-24: bsgrub bya 'khor lo'i khang stong gzhag / thod pa kha sbyar nang bcug la //
T02TD2013E:226b-25: bcu gsum dkyil 'khor dbus su gzhag / rnal 'byor bzhi rdzogs rtsa ba'i sngags //
T02TD2013E:226b-26: gtso bo thugs ka 'khor de bzhin //
T02TD2013E:226b-27: bkod pa bltas pas sngags dang lhas //
T02TD2013E:226b-29: sprul pas gzhan bskul rigs rigs kyi //
T02TD2013E:226b-30: bsgrub bya'i yi ge rtsa dang ni //
T02TD2013E:226b-31: bdud rtsi bcu dang sems blangs la //
T02TD2013E:226b-32: dkyil 'khor lha la dbang bskur zhing //
T02TD2013E:226b-33: lhar bsgrub dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bya //
T02TD2013E:226b-34: zla gcig nyi ma bzhi ru bcad //
T02TD2013E:226b-35: bzhi tshad bdun dang zhag gnyis te //
T02TD2013E:226b-36: dang por gsol gdab tha mar bshags //
T02TD2013E:226b-37: pra ma ya h'um phat dang ni //
T02TD2013E:226b-38: rakta tsa ra pa ya dang //
T02TD2013E:226b-39: mur tsa pa tsa pa ya dang //
T02TD2013E:226b-40: du ma sba sarba m'a ra ya //
T02TD2013E:226b-41: rim pas sngags dang ming spel bzlas //
T02TD2013E:226b-43: mtshan mo hr'i: shti:'i sbyor ba ni //
T02TD2013E:226b-44: gong du bstan pa de nyid do //
T02TD2013E:227a-2: khro bo rnams ni de bzhin bskul //
T02TD2013E:227a-3: sgrub pa po yang skra grol zhing //
T02TD2013E:227a-4: gcer bu bdud rtsi lngas byugs la //
T02TD2013E:227a-5: lho sgor lho ru phyogs pa yis //
T02TD2013E:227a-6: g-yon brkyang da ma ru dkrol lo //
T02TD2013E:227a-7: ha ha zhes pa'i sgrub pa po //
T02TD2013E:227a-8: gsum mam dpa' brtson rang nyid bsgrub //
T02TD2013E:227a-9: ya ma me dakshe lnga yis //
T02TD2013E:227a-10: zhe sdang la sogs las skyes pa'i //
T02TD2013E:227a-11: sprul mgo glang mgo bya yi mgo //
T02TD2013E:227a-12: 'brug mgo phag gi mgo bo can //
T02TD2013E:227a-13: gshin rje'i rgyal po lnga bskul ba //
T02TD2013E:227a-15: yatstsha ni ra shan pa bzhi //
T02TD2013E:227a-16: gsod bshu gcod dang za bar byed //
T02TD2013E:227a-17: dz'a sa do ru drag mo bzhi //

T02TD2013E:230a-46: r'a yi las byed ral tshar dgu //
T02TD2013E:230a-47: r'a yis 'bod do khyed bskul lo //
T02TD2013E:230a-48: za byed bdag po r'a hu la //
T02TD2013E:230a-49: chu srin mgo can gshin rje 'jigs //
T02TD2013E:230a-50: skye 'gro khyod kyis za bar byed //
T02TD2013E:230a-51: g-yas kyi 'khor los dum bur gtubs //
T02TD2013E:230b-0: @230b g-yon gyi lcags kyus rab tu gzung //
T02TD2013E:230b-2: las byed rnams kyi chung ma brgyad //
T02TD2013E:230b-3: dmar mo khrag gi ral pa can //
T02TD2013E:230b-4: gri gug thod pas lag gnyis 'brel //
T02TD2013E:230b-5: las kyi gshin rje'i chung ma yin //
T02TD2013E:230b-6: khams gsum skye 'gro lto bar chug / gcod cing sha khrag za la dga' //
T02TD2013E:230b-7: 'khor lo bskor cig gshin rje'i yum //
T02TD2013E:230b-8: dz'a sa do ru yi las byed ma //
T02TD2013E:230b-9: ts'a rtsi phag mo dbyangs can ma //
T02TD2013E:230b-10: goo r'i bzhi yi bka' nyan ma //
T02TD2013E:230b-11: dus bzhi 'byung ba'i lha mo bzhi //
T02TD2013E:230b-12: sha khrag drod dang dbugs la gteng ;
T02TD2013E:230b-13: / dz'a sa do rus khyed 'bod kyis //
T02TD2013E:230b-14: sdig can 'di yi sha khrag drongs //
T02TD2013E:230b-15: dbugs 'di khyod kyis myur du phrol //
T02TD2013E:230b-16: sgo ba'i pho nya bka' nyan cing //
T02TD2013E:230b-17: na yo na ra'i las byed ma //
T02TD2013E:230b-18: zung shig chings shig rab tu bsdoms //
T02TD2013E:230b-19: 'khor lor gnon pa'i las kyis shig /
T02TD2013E:230b-20: dus la bab po tsan tra dza //
T02TD2013E:230b-21: bka' las ma 'da' sa ma ya //
T02TD2013E:230b-22: rnal 'byor ma bslu dkar ma dkar //
T02TD2013E:230b-23: bstan pa srungs shig dar ma dpal //
T02TD2013E:230b-24: ya ma me da kshe che ge mo m'a ra ya rbad rbad /
T02TD2013E:230b-25: ya dz'a ni ra che ge mo m'a ra ya kh'a hi kh'a hi /
T02TD2013E:230b-26: dz'a sa do ru che ge mo m'a ra ya dzva la dzva la /
T02TD2013E:230b-27: na yo ni r'a che ge mo m'a ra ya dzdza /
T02TD2013E:230b-28: gshin rje'i lto bar 'khor lo bskor //
T02TD2013E:230b-29: gshin rje 'khor gyi pho nya'i tshogs //
T02TD2013E:230b-30: bya dang sprul dang gcan gzan khyi //
T02TD2013E:230b-31: sha zan thams cad myur du rgyug / sdig can 'di la rnam par rol //
T02TD2013E:230b-32: rang rang pags pa sha dang khrag / zhag dang tshil dang rkang mar rus //
T02TD2013E:230b-33: dbang po don snying skal kh'a hi //
T02TD2013E:230b-34: de nas las la sbyar ba ni //
T02TD2013E:230b-35: rgyal po gtum po tsanda l'i //
T02TD2013E:230b-36: 'khor lo thod pa kha sbyar gzhug / lho sgor thod pa sgyed steng gzhag / srid pa gsum gyi sems can rnams //
T02TD2013E:230b-37: dbang med skye 'chi'i las la bskul //
T02TD2013E:230b-38: mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa yi //
T02TD2013E:230b-39: las kyi gshin rje pho mo bskyed //
T02TD2013E:230b-40: ya yis dgug gzhug bcing pa dang //
T02TD2013E:230b-41: gnyis med gshin rje'i lto ba dkrug / khru gang gshin rje'i bskyed sogs yang //
T02TD2013E:230b-42: de ltar las mkhan dgu sogs bya //
T02TD2013E:231a-2: gzugs la bskyed dang dgug sogs bstim //
T02TD2013E:231a-3: khro bo chos skyong bka' bsgo zhing //
T02TD2013E:231a-4: snying po bdun 'bum bzla ba dang //
T02TD2013E:231a-5: sha chen khrag chen gtor ma bzang //
T02TD2013E:231a-6: bsgrub bya skyabs med khro bos bsgral //
T02TD2013E:231a-7: de nas nyi ma lngar phye la //
T02TD2013E:231a-8: nyin mo so so mtshan mo dril //
T02TD2013E:231a-9: las sngags rtsa sngags so so la //
T02TD2013E:231a-11: sngags kyi lha rnams so sor bskul //
T02TD2013E:231a-12: rdo rje 'jigs byed sngags brjod pas //
T02TD2013E:231a-13: gti mug gshin rje gshed sogs rnams //
T02TD2013E:231a-14: dzin dzik sgrogs phyogs skyong bskul //
T02TD2013E:231a-15: khro bos gshin rje ded cing bskul //
T02TD2013E:231a-16: bsgrub bya'i ske nas 'khor los lus //
T02TD2013E:231a-17: so sor blang dang so sor khyer //
T02TD2013E:231a-18: sha dang khrag sogs sbyin pa'i rgyu //
T02TD2013E:231a-19: phung po khams sogs lhar bya zhing //
T02TD2013E:231a-20: sems ni mi bskyod zhing du 'phang //
T02TD2013E:231a-21: khro bo phyogs skyong gshin rje yi //
T02TD2013E:231a-22: g-yon gyi mtshon chas 'gugs byed cing //
T02TD2013E:231a-23: g-yas kyi mtshon chas gsod par bsam //
T02TD2013E:231a-24: snying rjes khros pa'i las la bskul //
T02TD2013E:231a-25: de nas sbyin sreg mnan pa ste //
T02TD2013E:231a-26: pha mes bskyal ba'i dur khrod du //
T02TD2013E:231a-27: 'khor lo gshin rjes mnan pa spa //
T02TD2013E:231a-28: thab khung nang du gru gsum bya //
T02TD2013E:231a-29: khru phyed brko zhing rdzas ngan byug / dur gyi shing la dur khrod mes //
T02TD2013E:231a-30: spar la me lha gshin rje dang //
T02TD2013E:231a-31: rdo rje 'jigs byed bskyed sogs bya //
T02TD2013E:231a-32: rdo rje 'jigs byed sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2013E:231a-33: gzugs brnyan mi rus phye ma dang /
T02TD2013E:231a-34: de yi rjes dang skra sen dang //
T02TD2013E:231a-35: rnam snang chu dang bcas pa rnams //
T02TD2013E:231a-36: nam phyed dag nas nam phyed bsreg / tshu tshun dha ra'i pags pa ru //
T02TD2013E:231a-37: rnam snang chu yi sbyor ba ni //
T02TD2013E:231a-38: bla ma'i ngag la legs blangs la //
T02TD2013E:231a-39: gnas su sbas na nges par 'grub //
T02TD2013E:231a-40: de nas rtags sam nges 'phos nas //
T02TD2013E:231a-41: bsgrub bya de la dbang bskur zhing //
T02TD2013E:231a-42: bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i cho ga yis //
T02TD2013E:231a-43: mi bskyod zhing du nges par skye //
T02TD2013E:231a-44: rgyal ba'i thugs rjes gnang ba la //
T02TD2013E:231a-46: rgyal bas bden par gsungs pa dang //
T02TD2013E:231b-0: bdag gis brgyud pa'i man @231b ngag mthong //
T02TD2013E:231b-1: ting nge 'dzin ma gsang sngags mchod //
T02TD2013E:231b-2: yang na rdzas ma tshogs pa yin //
T02TD2013E:231b-3: 'on kyang zhe sdang kho na dang //
T02TD2013E:231b-4: dam tshig nyams pa dag kyang srid //
T02TD2013E:231b-5: tsanda l'i yis mtshon bsnun la //
T02TD2013E:231b-6: las kyi gshin rje'i 'khor lo bskyed //
T02TD2013E:231b-7: gnas su yi ge dgod pa dang //
T02TD2013E:231b-8: lto par 'khor lo bri bar bya //
T02TD2013E:231b-9: mtshan mo sngags kun gcig tu bzla //
T02TD2013E:231b-10: nyin mo so sor phye la bzlas //
T02TD2013E:231b-11: rdo rje 'jigs byed bris sku la //
T02TD2013E:231b-12: sgron ma chen po'i mchod pa 'bul //
T02TD2013E:231b-13: spro bsdus bskul don snga ma bzhin //
T02TD2013E:231b-14: zla ba phyed kyis de nges 'grub //
T02TD2013E:231b-15: de nas de yi pags pa bshu ;
T02TD2013E:231b-16: / lha yi gnas kyi sha rnams kun //
T02TD2013E:231b-17: bzung nas rjes la las kun la //
T02TD2013E:231b-18: 'khor lo lha yi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2013E:231b-19: zhi dang rgyas pa dbang la sogs //
T02TD2013E:231b-21: mchod dang gtor ma rgya chen dang //
T02TD2013E:231b-22: snying rje kho nas bsgrub par bya //
T02TD2013E:231b-23: rjes thob mnyam par bzhag pas 'grub //
T02TD2013E:231b-24: bskyed dang rdzogs dang gnyis med pa'i //
T02TD2013E:231b-25: bsam gtan bzlas pa spro bsdu yis //
T02TD2013E:231b-26: rtag tu bsnyen pa bya ba yin //
T02TD2013E:231b-27: des kyang grub par ma gyur zhing //
T02TD2013E:231b-28: mtshan ma rmi lam rtags rnams med //
T02TD2013E:231b-29: 'khrugs dang nor ba byung ba dag ;
T02TD2013E:231b-30: / dam tshig nyams pa yin pas sbyang //
T02TD2013E:231b-31: dbang bskur tshogs kyi mchod pa dag / sngon gyi slob dpon de nyid dam //
T02TD2013E:231b-32: grub thob sgrub pa rtag tu byed //
T02TD2013E:231b-33: de mnyes byas la zhu ba bya //
T02TD2013E:231b-34: rdo rje 'jigs byed rgyud nyid kyi //
T02TD2013E:231b-35: cho ga shes pas dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2013E:231b-36: de nas cho ga'i rim pa yis //
T02TD2013E:231b-38: ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang //
T02TD2013E:231b-39: skye mched byin rlabs dbang bskur la //
T02TD2013E:231b-40: mi bskyod cod pan ldan pa yi //
T02TD2013E:231b-41: snying gar zla dkyil yi ge dh'i //
T02TD2013E:231b-43: sngags dbyings chos la spro bsdu bsam //
T02TD2013E:231b-44: rjes la mchod gtor bzlas pa 'bad //
T02TD2013E:231b-45: gnyid dang le lo'i bar chad spang //
T02TD2013E:231b-46: zhag drug zla drug lo drug tu //
T02TD2013E:231b-47: bsnyen pa'i cho ga dpa' bas bya //
T02TD2013E:231b-48: thun gcig zhag gcig zla ba lo //
T02TD2013E:231b-49: tshe gcig bskal bar dka' min bsgrub //
T02TD2013E:232a-0: @232a * // lam mchog 'di ni yun ring min //
T02TD2013E:232a-1: dam tshig snying rje thabs dang ldan //
T02TD2013E:232a-2: zla drug nang du rtags mthong bas //
T02TD2013E:232a-3: rgyal ba mnyes byed mngon spyod spyad //
T02TD2013E:232a-4: de rjes rjes thob 'gro ba la //
T02TD2013E:232a-5: phan phyir 'khor lo'i las la 'jug / phyi rol pa dag bstan la gnod //
T02TD2013E:232a-6: rang rig dam tshig nyams pa dag / mchod dang gtor ma bzlas la brtson //
T02TD2013E:232a-7: bsrungs pa dag gis 'gyangs pa la //
T02TD2013E:232a-8: ngag mnan bzlog pa'i 'khor lo bya //
T02TD2013E:232a-9: 'khor los sngags sbyor rim pa dang //
T02TD2013E:232a-10: rdzas dang ting 'dzin rim pa dang //
T02TD2013E:232a-11: bsnyen sgrub las sbyong zla drug gis //
T02TD2013E:232a-13: de las khyad par rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD2013E:232a-14: mnan dang bzlog pa'i cho ga ni //
T02TD2013E:232a-15: sngon du bsnyen dang rtag tu bsgom //
T02TD2013E:232a-16: gzhan du rgyal ba'i bka' las 'das //
T02TD2013E:232a-17: mar tshe brgyad la bri ba ni //
T02TD2013E:232a-18: ras dag sngon ltar rdzas kyis brgyad //
T02TD2013E:232a-19: yung ba ba blas kha bsgyur ba'i //
T02TD2013E:232a-20: sngon gyi rdzas kyis 'khor lo bri //
T02TD2013E:232a-21: 'khor lo'i yi ge dbri dang bsnan //
T02TD2013E:232a-22: las kyi bye brag shes pa yis //
T02TD2013E:232a-23: ma ra stambha bcu ba'i mthar //
T02TD2013E:232a-24: pra ma ra ya stambha ya lam //
T02TD2013E:232a-25: mkhas pas ya ma bzhi yi mthar //
T02TD2013E:232a-26: khang stong bzhi la ling+ga bskor //
T02TD2013E:232a-27: de bzhin spel ma zhag lnga bzla /
T02TD2013E:232a-28: dang po zhag la bsnyen pa dang //
T02TD2013E:232a-29: tha ma lkugs pa'i chu la mnan //
T02TD2013E:232a-30: zhag bdun dag gis res par gnon //
T02TD2013E:232a-31: yang na mi 'jigs bsrung ba ni //
T02TD2013E:232a-32: rtag par bsgom pa de nyid mchog /'khor lo 'jam pa'i rdo rjer bskyed //
T02TD2013E:232a-33: de nyid gsum gyi spro bsdus bsrung //
T02TD2013E:232a-34: bya min nyal pa'i sa min spangs //
T02TD2013E:232a-35: shar du phyogs shing gsum la skyabs /
T02TD2013E:232a-37: rten 'brel mthu yang thabs yin pas //
T02TD2013E:232a-38: bram ze srid bsrung las byung ras //
T02TD2013E:232a-39: tshes brgyad dag la 'bas chus brgyad //
T02TD2013E:232a-40: tsandan dkar po til dkar dang //
T02TD2013E:232a-41: gu gul dkar pos legs byas la //
T02TD2013E:232a-42: gur kum gi wang legs sbyar bas //
T02TD2013E:232a-43: bcu bzhi'i snga dro bri ba ni //
T02TD2013E:232a-44: bcu gnyis sor ni zlum por bskor //
T02TD2013E:232a-45: phyi rol rdo rje ra ba la //
T02TD2013E:232a-46: me ri h'um dang rab tu ldan //
T02TD2013E:232a-47: de nas cha mnyam bzhi ru bskor //
T02TD2013E:232a-48: phyi rol 'khor la sum cu gnyis //
T02TD2013E:232a-49: rtsa sngags 'khor lo'i rtse mor dgod //
T02TD2013E:232b-0: @232b rtsa bar aom ni drug cu bzhi //
T02TD2013E:232b-1: bsrung ba'i ming ni mtha' rten bri //
T02TD2013E:232b-2: rtsibs mtshan h'um phat mtha' brten pa'i //
T02TD2013E:232b-3: par chod dag gis ming dag bri //
T02TD2013E:232b-4: re mig k'a li dag gis dgang //
T02TD2013E:232b-5: de nas 'khor lo bcu drug la //
T02TD2013E:232b-6: hr'i: sogs brgyad ni brgyad por bri //
T02TD2013E:232b-7: brgyad la ming dang bsrung bar bcas //
T02TD2013E:232b-8: sngar bzhin rtsa bar aom gyis brten //
T02TD2013E:232b-9: mtshan la phat brten gzhan dag bri //
T02TD2013E:232b-10: re mig dag la a'a li yin //
T02TD2013E:232b-11: de bar brgyad la snying po ni //
T02TD2013E:232b-12: aa thung bsnan pas brgyad bri'o //
T02TD2013E:232b-13: rtsa bar aa brten bsrung ba gzhag / mtshan mar h'um phat gzhan bsnan no //
T02TD2013E:232b-14: de nas dh'i: dbus gzhag pa yi //
T02TD2013E:232b-15: phyogs bzhir ao dh'i: sv'a h'a dgod //
T02TD2013E:232b-16: stong pa bzhi la ming bcas bsrung //
T02TD2013E:232b-17: aom gnyis hr'i: kshe shar yin la //
T02TD2013E:232b-18: da me ma ni byang nub lho //
T02TD2013E:232b-19: srong la mandala legs byugs la //
T02TD2013E:232b-20: me tog nag po bcu bdun dgod //
T02TD2013E:232b-21: de steng bzhag la rnal 'byor bzhi //
T02TD2013E:232b-22: rdzogs nas gtor ma btang dang bcol //
T02TD2013E:232b-23: bzlas pa spro bsdu yi ge dang //
T02TD2013E:232b-24: bcas pa'i phyag mtshan sna tshogs dang //
T02TD2013E:232b-25: rdo rje sa gzhi ra ba gur //
T02TD2013E:232b-26: rtag tu de nang gnas pa gdags //
T02TD2013E:232b-27: yang na rtag tu mchod par bya //
T02TD2013E:232b-28: mgul lam gtsug dang dpung g-yon gdags //
T02TD2013E:232b-29: khro bo khros kyang 'jigs mi nus //
T02TD2013E:232b-31: sngon bzhin rnal 'byor bzhis bskyed dam //
T02TD2013E:232b-32: rgyud las myur dang skad cig las //
T02TD2013E:232b-34: stong dang snying rje me ri dang //
T02TD2013E:232b-35: dra gur ldan pas bdud bzhi bzlog / de nas 'khor lo so bzhi ni //
T02TD2013E:232b-36: steng du aom las lha chen dgu //
T02TD2013E:232b-37: rtsa sngags rnams la gshin rje brgyad //
T02TD2013E:232b-38: las mkhan brgyad dang pho nya brgyad //
T02TD2013E:232b-39: shan pa brgyad ni bskyed pa ste //
T02TD2013E:232b-40: dkyil 'khor rang lha'i mngag pas bzlog ;
T02TD2013E:232b-41: / h'um las rdo rje'i mig can rigs //
T02TD2013E:232b-42: phat las 'og tu klu chen brgyad //
T02TD2013E:232b-43: rtsa sngags bdun bzlas bzlog par bsam //
T02TD2013E:232b-44: de nas 'khor lo rtsibs bcu la //
T02TD2013E:232b-45: steng 'og phyogs skyong bskyed pa dang //
T02TD2013E:232b-46: de nang drug las snying po las //
T02TD2013E:233a-2: de bzhin rang bzhin re re gzhug / gnyis med gyur pa las bcol ba //
T02TD2013E:233a-3: so so lus bong ljang gu'i mdog / g-yas kun 'khor lo 'dzin pa dang //
T02TD2013E:233a-4: g-yon kun sdigs mdzub byed pa yis //
T02TD2013E:233a-5: phas kyi 'byung po bzlog bsam pa //
T02TD2013E:233a-6: snying gar ye shes sems dpa' ni //
T02TD2013E:233a-8: bdun brjod sku yi rigs rnams gzhug / ye shes gshin rje gshed bsams nas //
T02TD2013E:233a-9: ya m'anta ka bdun brjod la //
T02TD2013E:233a-10: gsung rigs thams cad bskul zhing gzhug / dam tshig 'jigs byed gsal ba yis //
T02TD2013E:233a-11: hr'i: shtri: bdun brjod thugs rigs gzhug / bcu gsum yon tan rtsa sngags brjod //
T02TD2013E:233a-12: bdun gyis rgyal ba thams cad gzhug / de bzhin bdun bdun nang rim du //
T02TD2013E:233a-13: phyi nas brjod pas bzlog pa'o //
T02TD2013E:233a-14: sems ni ting nge 'dzin dh'i: la sba //
T02TD2013E:233a-15: bdag ni ye shes a'a: la sba //
T02TD2013E:233a-16: lus ni dam tshig aom la sba //
T02TD2013E:233a-17: rdo rje bzlas pa ldan pas zhal //
T02TD2013E:233a-18: yang na pho mo ma nor ba'i //
T02TD2013E:233a-19: thod par 'khor lo bri ba ni //
T02TD2013E:233a-20: rdzas dus sngon bzhin legs bris la //
T02TD2013E:233a-21: m'a ra'i gnas su stambha gzhag / steng gi thod pa'i spyi rdol la //
T02TD2013E:233a-22: ling+ga tshon lngas btags pa drang //
T02TD2013E:233a-23: sngags gsum tha mar stambha btags //
T02TD2013E:233a-24: dh'i: sv'a h'a yis bsrung bar bya //
T02TD2013E:233a-25: zhag gam thun mam zla ba ru //
T02TD2013E:233a-26: thun gcig dus gsum dag tu bra ba //
T02TD2013E:233a-27: non pa'i rtags dag nges pa dang //
T02TD2013E:233a-28: ba bla yung bas g-yam nag la //
T02TD2013E:233a-29: nang du sna tshogs rdo rje dang//
T02TD2013E:233a-30: phyi ru ri rab bris pa yis //
T02TD2013E:233a-31: mi 'bab mtsho ru mnan pa bya //
T02TD2013E:233a-32: ba bla yud pa ldong ros dang //
T02TD2013E:233a-33: gi wang dag gis thab khung ni //
T02TD2013E:233a-34: khru gang gru bzhi bar byugs la //
T02TD2013E:233a-35: skye rab dur khrod shing dang ni //
T02TD2013E:233a-36: seng ldeng glang po che yi spangs //
T02TD2013E:233a-37: rgyal po'i me sngar me lha ser //
T02TD2013E:233a-38: 'jigs byed bskyed sogs gsal ba la //
T02TD2013E:233a-39: ba bla yungs kar yung ba dang //
T02TD2013E:233a-40: glang po che yi sha bsregs pa //
T02TD2013E:233a-41: byang du phyogs pa'i ming dang bsreg / zhag bdun bsregs na rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD2013E:233a-42: gnod cing rengs pa'i sbyor ba'o //
T02TD2013E:233a-43: yang na pra ba nag dang dmar //
T02TD2013E:233b-0: cho ga sngon mas @233b de bzhin mnan //
T02TD2013E:233b-1: dam tshig bskang ba'i cho ga yis //
T02TD2013E:233b-2: bsrung ba shin tu bsdus te bzang //
T02TD2013E:233b-3: stong dang snying rje kho na yis //
T02TD2013E:233b-4: bsrung ba mchog gis sangs rgyas 'grub //
T02TD2013E:233b-5: sngags rnams rgyun du bzla ba dang //
T02TD2013E:233b-6: dge gzhan gtor ma dag la brtson //
T02TD2013E:233b-7: dam tshig bla mas legs bskyangs na //
T02TD2013E:233b-8: bar chod thams cad bzlog par 'gyur //
T02TD2013E:233b-9: las kun sngon du bsnyen pa ni //
T02TD2013E:233b-10: zla gnyis bsgrub pa zhag bdun dang //
T02TD2013E:233b-11: las sbyor zhag re sbyor dgos pa //
T02TD2013E:233b-12: sgrub pa po yis shes par bya //
T02TD2013E:233b-13: bskrad pa rgyal mtshan ras blangs la //
T02TD2013E:233b-14: sngon gyi rdzas kyis 'khor lo bya //
T02TD2013E:233b-15: sngags spel ling+ga shes pas dgod //
T02TD2013E:233b-16: dgug gzhug rim pa zhag bdun bsgrub //
T02TD2013E:233b-17: sa bdun dag la rta dang ni //
T02TD2013E:233b-18: bsgrub bya zhon pa'i gzugs byas te //
T02TD2013E:233b-19: rlung gi dkyil 'khor steng lho phyogs //
T02TD2013E:233b-20: nyi ma'i nyin mo tsanda l'i //
T02TD2013E:233b-21: lus la ske tshe'i mar byugs nas //
T02TD2013E:233b-22: nim pa'i shing la nges 'dzeg pa'i //
T02TD2013E:233b-23: thod par nyi phyed sbu ma de bzhar //
T02TD2013E:233b-24: bya rog tshang bsreg thal ba dang //
T02TD2013E:233b-25: dur khrod thal ba bsres pa ni //
T02TD2013E:233b-26: de yi mgo la blugs shing byug / rgyal mtshan ras bsregs thal ba dang //
T02TD2013E:233b-27: bsres pa de yis rkang la bsku //
T02TD2013E:233b-28: dur khrod sol ba bya rog khrag / bya rog rus pas shing shun la //
T02TD2013E:233b-29: rlung gi dkyil 'khor bris byas la //
T02TD2013E:233b-30: de yi dkyil du bsgrub bya yi //
T02TD2013E:233b-31: ling+ga ming sngags spel ba bri //
T02TD2013E:233b-32: bya rog dag gam sa bdun las //
T02TD2013E:233b-33: byas pa'i mgul du de btags te //
T02TD2013E:233b-34: lho ru phyogs pas de sngon gzhag / sa bdun sbrus las gshin rje ni //
T02TD2013E:233b-35: dbyug thogs de yi rgyab nas 'ded //
T02TD2013E:233b-36: dgug gzhug gsal bas sgrub pa yi //
T02TD2013E:233b-37: rtags byung zhag bdun lon pa dang //
T02TD2013E:233b-38: 'khor lo gshin rje'i lto bar gzhag / ling+ga bsgrub bya'i snying gar sba //
T02TD2013E:233b-39: nim ba'i shing gcig rtsa ba ru //
T02TD2013E:233b-40: lho ru phyogs pas bskyal bar bsgrod //
T02TD2013E:233b-41: de nas sbyin sreg bya ba ni //
T02TD2013E:233b-42: rlung gi thab khung dbus su ni //
T02TD2013E:233b-43: nim pa 'bras bu bya rog tshang //
T02TD2013E:233b-44: da du ra shing dur khrod shing //
T02TD2013E:233b-45: dur khrod shing gis me sbar la //
T02TD2013E:233b-46: me lha ljang gu bskyed pa dang //
T02TD2013E:234a-0: @234a * // 'jigs byed bskyed sogs gsal ba na //
T02TD2013E:234a-1: gcer bu skra grol lhor phyogs pas //
T02TD2013E:234a-2: bya rog khyim bya sbal ba khyi //
T02TD2013E:234a-3: sha dang rnga mo'i rtug pa chang //
T02TD2013E:234a-4: byi la'i khrag gis sbus la bsreg / yi ge bcu pa gtsor byas la //
T02TD2013E:234a-5: ming dang bcas pas grub pa yin //
T02TD2013E:234a-6: zhag bdun byas na grong khyer skrod //
T02TD2013E:234a-7: skyo bar bya ba skrod dang mtshungs //
T02TD2013E:234a-8: sha chen da du ro 'bras bsreg / dbye ba'i sbyor ba bstan pa ni //
T02TD2013E:234a-9: bram ze ma bi ma he rta //
T02TD2013E:234a-10: bya rog 'ug pa ni le sbrul //
T02TD2013E:234a-11: khrag gis 'khor lo brgyad dag bri //
T02TD2013E:234a-12: mkhas pas sngags dgod spel pas bzlas ;
T02TD2013E:234a-13: / bram ze rigs ngan thod par gzhag / sa bdun dag la ma he rta //
T02TD2013E:234a-14: gzugs la shing shun ling+ga sba //
T02TD2013E:234a-15: sgro gnyis rus pa gnyis la ni //
T02TD2013E:234a-16: bcu ba'i sngags spel bri ba dang //
T02TD2013E:234a-17: sgro gnyis bcings la pags par gzhug / nim pa'i shing gi steng du gzhag / sa bdun rgyu las bsgrub bya ba //
T02TD2013E:234a-18: ma he rta la bskyon byas nas //
T02TD2013E:234a-19: da du ra yi thal ba dang //
T02TD2013E:234a-20: tsher mas bcu pa'i sngags bzla'o //
T02TD2013E:234a-21: las sbyor ling+ga bsgrub bya sba //
T02TD2013E:234a-23: de nas chu dang me yi thab //
T02TD2013E:234a-24: tsher ma 'o ma can gyi shing //
T02TD2013E:234a-25: dur khrod shing dang 'gas phub la //
T02TD2013E:234a-26: dur khrod gtum po'i me spar te //
T02TD2013E:234a-27: lha ni dmar nag bskyed pa dang //
T02TD2013E:234a-28: rdo rje 'jigs byed bskyed pa la //
T02TD2013E:234a-29: ma he rta dang bya rog 'ug / rma bya sbrul gyi sha bsreg bya //
T02TD2013E:234a-30: yi ge bcu pa ming spel bas //
T02TD2013E:234a-32: de nas dbang dang dgug pa bstan //
T02TD2013E:234a-33: gur kum gi wang srin lag khrag /'khor lo brgyad dag zi bar bya //
T02TD2013E:234a-34: thod pa gnyis la 'khor lo bri //
T02TD2013E:234a-35: 'khor lo dgug gzhug dril la gzhug / gur kum gi wang srin lag khrag / sa bdun sbrus la bsgrub bya yi //
T02TD2013E:234a-36: sor mo bcu drug gzugs brnyan la //
T02TD2013E:234a-37: sha khrag gi wang gur kum gyis //
T02TD2013E:234a-38: gro ga'i 'khor lo snying gar gzhug / me tog spos phor dus gsum mchod //
T02TD2013E:234a-39: nub tu phyogs pas rtsa sngags bzla //
T02TD2013E:234a-40: seng ldeng me la thod pa bsro //
T02TD2013E:234a-41: bcu pa'i snying po las sbyor bya //
T02TD2013E:234b-1: gsad pa'i 'khor lo sngags bye ba //
T02TD2013E:234b-2: ro bsreg sol ba sbra tshil dang //
T02TD2013E:234b-3: tsha ba gsum dang rdzas gzhan la //
T02TD2013E:234b-4: bsgrub bya mtho gang kha so gtsigs //
T02TD2013E:234b-5: 'khor lo snying gar bcu ga byas la //
T02TD2013E:234b-6: g-yon brkyang ma he zhal sbyar bas //
T02TD2013E:234b-7: mnan la yi ge bcu pas dgug / sbyin sreg thab khung zla gam du //
T02TD2013E:234b-8: tsandan dmar po gur kum dang //
T02TD2013E:234b-9: gi wang srin lag khrag gis byug / seng ldeng me la lha gnyis dmar //
T02TD2013E:234b-10: ske tshe'i gzugs rten nya dang chang //
T02TD2013E:234b-11: til dang 'bras kyi tsher ma dug / bdud rtsi lnga dang khrag sbrus la //
T02TD2013E:234b-12: nub tu phyogs pas dus gsum du //
T02TD2013E:234b-13: brgya rtsa brgyad ni zhag bdun bya //
T02TD2013E:234b-14: sha lnga rnam snang rdo rje'i chu //
T02TD2013E:234b-15: chang dang bsres na rgyal po sogs //
T02TD2013E:234b-16: thams cad dbang du 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD2013E:234b-17: yi ge bcu pa'i sbyor bas bya //
T02TD2013E:234b-18: rgyas par 'dod la rgyas pa'i las //
T02TD2013E:234b-19: sgrub pa po yis 'di ltar bya //
T02TD2013E:234b-20: rgyal po khyim bdag ras blangs la //
T02TD2013E:234b-21: gur gum gi wang tsandan gyis //
T02TD2013E:234b-22: 'khor lo brgyangs la bri bar bya //
T02TD2013E:234b-23: sra ba gru bzhi ser por sba //
T02TD2013E:234b-24: srad bu ser pos rgya gram dkri //
T02TD2013E:234b-25: mandala ser po'i steng du gzhag / byang du phyogs pas bsam gtan sngags //
T02TD2013E:234b-26: rdo rje 'jigs byed sbyor bas bya //
T02TD2013E:234b-27: me tog ser pos dus gsum mchod //
T02TD2013E:234b-28: phra ma gshin rje gshed mnyam pa'i //
T02TD2013E:234b-29: rgyas pa'i las ni gang 'dod pa //
T02TD2013E:234b-31: sbyin sreg rgyas pa'i thab khung du //
T02TD2013E:234b-32: au dumw'a ra'i shing la me //
T02TD2013E:234b-33: spar la lha gnyis ser por bskyed //
T02TD2013E:234b-35: 'bras zho dag / byang du bltas pas stong du bsreg / gang 'dod pa de rgyas par 'gyur //
T02TD2013E:234b-36: sngags dang ming du bcas bsregs na //
T02TD2013E:234b-38: zhi ba'i las dag 'di ltar bya //
T02TD2013E:234b-39: stong dang snying rje 'jigs byed ldan //
T02TD2013E:234b-40: tsandan til dkar gur gum dang //
T02TD2013E:234b-41: gi wang go ro tsa na yis //
T02TD2013E:234b-42: 'khor lo brgyad dang yi ge dgod //
T02TD2013E:234b-43: sra ba zlum po dkar po sba //
T02TD2013E:234b-44: srad bu dkar pos dkri byas la //
T02TD2013E:234b-45: mandala dkar po'i steng bzhag ste //
T02TD2013E:234b-46: shar du phyogs pas zhi bas bsgrub //
T02TD2013E:235a-0: @235a * // me tog dkar pos dus gsum mchod //
T02TD2013E:235a-1: sbyin sreg thab khung zlum po ru //
T02TD2013E:235a-2: ba la sha la me sbar la //
T02TD2013E:235a-3: me lha rdo rje 'jigs byed dkar //
T02TD2013E:235a-4: bskyed dang dgug sogs legs par mchod //
T02TD2013E:235a-5: shar du kha bltas til dang mar //
T02TD2013E:235a-6: sbrang rtsi 'o ma d'ur ba dag /
T02TD2013E:235a-7: dus gsum dag tu zhag bdun bsreg / bdag dang gzhan gyi bar chad zhi //
T02TD2013E:235a-8: las gzhan kun dang sbogs pa ni //
T02TD2013E:235a-9: 'khor lo'i rdzas dang sbyor bas dbye //
T02TD2013E:235a-10: man ngag brgyud pa bla ma bsten //
T02TD2013E:235a-11: rdzas dang dam tshig ting 'dzin gsal //
T02TD2013E:235a-12: sngags la gus na 'grub pa las //
T02TD2013E:235a-13: ma gsang gzhan du mi 'grub po //
T02TD2013E:235a-14: thams cad rdzas dang 'khor lo dang //
T02TD2013E:235a-15: bsam gtan sngags la brtson pa dang //
T02TD2013E:235a-16: bsnyen pa brtul zhugs dpa' ba dang //
T02TD2013E:235a-17: bla ma la gus gsang na 'grub //
T02TD2013E:235a-18: de las gzhan pas mi 'grub pas //
T02TD2013E:235a-19: rgyud ltar snod btags 'bad pa gsang ;
T02TD2013E:235a-20: / ma gsang snod ngan la bshad pas //
T02TD2013E:235a-21: slob dpon 'di dang phyi mar brlag / rgyud don bla ma la brten nas //
T02TD2013E:235a-22: mos pas 'di byas mkhas pas bkod //
T02TD2013E:235a-23: sgra nor don log nyes pa rnams //
T02TD2013E:235a-24: rdo rje 'jigs byed chos skyong bshags //
T02TD2013E:235a-25: rgyud dang gdams ngag la brten te //
T02TD2013E:235a-26: 'gro la bsams nas sgrub thabs bris //
T02TD2013E:235a-27: 'di las dge ba ci thob pas //
T02TD2013E:235a-28: bdag gzhan rdo rje'i sku thob shog / dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs rdo rje 'od ces bya ba /
T02TD2013E:235a-29: slob dpon chen po bee ro tsa na rakshi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2013E:235a-32: // / mkhas pa chen po bee ro tsa na rakshi ta de nyid dang /
T02TD2013E:235a-33: lo ts'a ba glan dar ma ma tis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
